name: Game Career Swipe
description:
The game is in active development, please feel free to share your feedback in the comments!

If you have planned of making your career in the game industry or are just curious to learn more about the game industry and its roles in general then this game is for you.

Find your place in the game industry by swiping through cards.

Art:

Brush icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Coding icons created by Kiranshastry - Flaticon

Music icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Toy icons created by Gregor Cresnar - Flaticon

Shaking hands icons created by Smashicons - Flaticon

Traffic icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Hand icons created by Pixel perfect - Flaticon

Star icons created by Pixel perfect - Flaticon
